name: Tag selector
description:
Element with tag **A** goes just by ```A```
**Example**: ```p``` selects all paragraph (```<p>```) elements

name: Descendant selector
task: Select a cat on a dog
description:
You can select descendant (any depth child) of ```A``` with selector ```B``` as ```A B```

**Example**: ```ul li``` selects all elements of unordered list
